alert.note: Alert for Lower Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 15 at 8:25PM MST until January 16 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 11 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. * WHERE...Locations including Blackfoot, Shelley and more rural areas of the Lower Snake Plain. We are NOT expecting the cities of American Falls, Pocatello, or Fort Hall to see wind chills below -20, but still well below zero. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 11 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
